column4: Validate Dell Z9432F-ON spine switch boot and initialization

column4: Validate Dell S5248F-ON leaf switch deployment
column6: 1. Power on switch; 2. Apply ZTP config; 3. Verify uplinks; 4. Check LLDP neighbors
column7: All 40 leaf switches operational with spine connectivity

column4: Validate eBGP peering between spine and leaf
column6: 1. Configure eBGP; 2. Verify peer status; 3. Check route tables; 4. Test convergence
column7: BGP sessions established with full route propagation

column4: Validate EVPN control plane and VXLAN data plane
column6: 1. Configure EVPN; 2. Create VNIs; 3. Verify VTEP; 4. Test MAC learning
column7: EVPN routes exchanged with VXLAN encapsulation working

column7: VLANs extend across all 40 racks via VXLAN fabric

column4: Validate AAA integration for switch management

column7: Network admins authenticate via centralized AAA

column4: Validate Ansible playbook execution for config
column6: 1. Run deployment playbook; 2. Verify config changes; 3. Test rollback; 4. Check idempotency
column7: Ansible automates switch configuration consistently

column4: Validate 25GbE server connections to leaf switches
column6: 1. Verify link state; 2. Check speed negotiation; 3. Test VLAN access; 4. Verify throughput
